I was wondering if there is anyway that I can extract links from an 
HTML page without fetching (downloading) it. Is this possible if I put
the HTMLextractor processor before the HTTPfetch processor in the
Fetch processing chain? I'm using Heritrix 1.4

Thanks in advance for answers (I'll probably get a NO)
